text: Remus Bogdan Chipirliu (born 21 July 1992) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays for Steaua București as a striker.Daniel Oprița promite transferuri spectaculoase la CSA Steaua. Un atacant cunoscut a dat deja răspunsul favorabil. gsp.ro ==Honours== ;Juventus București *Liga II: 2016–17 ;SCM Gloria Buzău *Liga III: 2018–19 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" rowspan="2"|Club !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" rowspan="2"|Season !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|League !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Cup !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|League Cup !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Europe !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Other !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="3"|Total |- !
